definition: to respond evasively or vaguely/to elude/to stall
to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions
to hem and haw/to stall/to stammer/to mumble/to falter
(idiom) to talk in a roundabout way to cover up the truth/evasive

sentences.english: I'm serious. I avoided her question.
sentences.chinese: 我語塞，支支吾吾地迴避了她的問題。

sentences.english: Stop stalling and answer my question.
sentences.chinese: 她支吾其詞避免回答一切問題。

sentences.english: Don't hum and haw, but air your views.
sentences.chinese: 別支支吾吾的，快亮明你的觀點。

sentences.english: You got me trippin, stumbling, flippin, fumbling.
sentences.chinese: 你令我支吾，結巴，冒失，犯錯，笨拙。

sentences.english: To talk or act insincerely or misleadingly; equivocate .
sentences.chinese: 支吾，搪塞不說真話，含糊其詞。

sentences.english: She stalled and evaded the question.
sentences.chinese: 她支吾着避而不答這個問題。

sentences.english: She manages to wriggle out of answering all the questions .
sentences.chinese: 她支吾其詞避免回答一切問題。

sentences.english: Around this figure the West, for four decades, prevaricated.
sentences.chinese: 四十年以來，西方對於這個人物，一直支支吾吾。

sentences.english: When Mason asks what Tony wanted, Nina brushes him off.
sentences.chinese: 梅森問她，託尼需要什麼，尼娜找個理由支吾了過去。

sentences.english: Tell us exactly what happened and don't prevaricate.
sentences.chinese: 有什麼就詳詳細細地告訴我們，不要支吾。

sentences.english: She shuffled , trying to keep it as a secret.
sentences.chinese: 她支支吾吾，想使那件事保密。

sentences.english: He hesitated constantly in telling his story.
sentences.chinese: 他講述個人經歷時總是支支吾吾。

sentences.english: He hummed and hawed for quite a while, failing to come out with a coherent story.
sentences.chinese: 他支吾了半天，也沒有說出個子醜寅卯來。

sentences.english: He began to hem and haw when I asked about his wife.
sentences.chinese: 我一問到他的妻子，他支支吾吾回答不出來了。

sentences.english: Three years later, the investigation has stalled.
sentences.chinese: 三年過去了，調查行動仍是支支吾吾。

sentences.english: He hemmed and hawed around and didn't tell me what I wanted to know.
sentences.chinese: 他支支吾吾地兜圈子，就是不肯說出我要知道的問題。

definition: to hem and haw/to stall/to stammer/to mumble/to falter
to hum and haw (idiom); to mumble as if hiding sth/to speak and break off, then start again/to hold sth back
to be at a loss for words/speechless
to show signs of reluctance or embarrassment
agape and tongue-tied (idiom); at a loss for words/gaping and speechless
